Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory757.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: "Hey buddy, it's time for the shift change.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: "You're late, you son of *****. I've been waiting forever.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The other resident retrieves a liquor flask and takes a few swigs.'}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: "Finally! I couldn't have a drink on duty and was dying for it.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: "Dammit, don't go drinking in front of me. You're making me crave it like crazy.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: 'Wanna have a sip?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The flask is handed over, and the man inhales deeply, savoring the aroma of the liquor within.'}
{2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: 'Emm...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: 'Nah, forget about it.', 4: '1'}
{3: "He reluctantly pushes the flask away and even steps back, as if fearing he'd regret his decision in the next second."}
{2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: "The mayor said no drinking on duty. I don't want to land myself in trouble.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: 'Dude, who knows when his son will show up for inspection?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: "What's the big deal? If you get caught, it's just a few days of no drinking. You can tough it out.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The flask is handed over again.'}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: "Hey, come on, join me for a drink. It's no fun doing it all alone.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: 'The person offering the drink will get punished too...', 4: '1'}
{3: "The flask is pushed back to its owner's hand."}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: "You know, I reckon we should stick to the mayor's rules. It's not that I'm scared or anything.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: "Tch... I just don't get it. This place was just a shabby old bar. What's there worth keeping an eye on?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: 'Not even scavengers come around here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: "Ah, forget it. Let's just do the job. Long as we get paid, who cares if the mayor's hiding gold in there or something.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: "Besides, this ain't the only spot with beefed-up guards.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'He raises his chin toward the distant cliff.'}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: 'They also put more guards at that entrance. Seems like they ain\'t just defending against those"Heater-Creatures".', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: "Shouldn't it be Hetero-Creatures?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: 'Yeah, right. Those smart-asses in Babylonia sure got a knack for giving things names that are a mouthful to say.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: "I reckon they're probably keeping an eye out for them Forsakens too, eh?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: 'After they went and turned the whole darn town upside down a few months back.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: "If it weren't for the mayor stepping in, them bastards would've dragged a few folks down with 'em. Ptoo!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'He spits on the ground in annoyance and takes another swig.'}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: "Well, ain't that a fine example of the non-interference deal or whatever? Just look at what happened.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: "The mayor was boiling mad back then... I thought he'd start vaporizing right then and there.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: 'You even know about this vaporizing word?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: 'I did go to school for a little while, even though I only graduated from primary school.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: 'Then help me read this, will ya?', 4: '1'}
{3: "The man takes out a newspaper and directs his companion's attention to the headline at the top of the page."}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: 'Man, you didn\'t even make it through preschool, eh? Lemme see... "Death Belongs Not to the Forsaken... Honoring Our Most Trusted Leader, Watanabe..."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: '****!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'He snatches the newspaper, accidentally spilling some of his drink onto the ground, yet paying no mind to the mishap as he reads intently.'}
{2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: 'Hey, not the drink...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: "Why are you getting all riled up? It's just someone kicking the bucket, ain't nothing unusual these days.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: 'Where did you get this?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: 'The wind blew it over.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: '?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: "What's got you all riled up? The wind blew that thing right into my face.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Strange Resident B', 3: "Then stick to your duty. I'll report this to the mayor.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'He hastily tucks the newspaper into his coat and dashes off to the other end of the town as fast as he can.'}
{2: 'Strange Resident A', 3: 'Hey, tell me what it says after my shift ends!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'While he shouts after his departing companion, he fails to notice the door behind him discreetly opening ajar.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory823.jpg'}
{1: 'World Government National Cemetery', 2: '04:00 p.m.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Watanabe places the bouquet in his hand at the foot of a tombstone.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Father, Mother, I've come to see you.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A new tombstone has been erected next to the old one.'}
{3: 'In the same location, at the same time of day, only the person here to mourn looks completely different from before.'}
{3: 'More than one new gravestones now populate the area. On the adjacent hill, low gravestones span across nearly every inch of land.'}
{3: 'Following the catastrophic defeat, the World Government took an extensive period to account for all the casualties incurred.'}
{3: 'Despite the mounting pressing issues at hand, the World Government still held a grand memorial ceremony to honor and remember those who were lost.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory829.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hans', 3: 'The challenges we face should not become reasons for us to forget their sacrifice.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Hans, now with a crown of white hair, uttered these words in his televised speech.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory823.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'But Watanabe has also noticed many changes taking place...'}
{3: 'The supermarket shelves are no longer abundantly filled, with many items quickly vanishing as soon as they are restocked.'}
{3: 'People have shifted their attention away from art to news and prices.'}
{3: 'Pedestrians are now a rare sight on the streets, and those who do venture out are only seen rushing in a hurry...'}
{3: 'The original Acadia Transfer has been renamed to the Acadia Evacuation.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Watanabe, you came too...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Ballard, too, has changed a lot. The shadows between his brows have deepened, and an unintentional aura of menace surrounds him, making it feel more difficult to approach him than before.'}
{3: 'He gently places the white flowers he held in front of the two gravestones, but unlike before, he refrains from uttering more words.'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'I heard you were assigned to the air force?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Yes, and they designed a special aerial combat frame for me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'You indeed have a talent for that.', 4: '2'}
{3: "He nods but still doesn't turn to look at Watanabe."}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'I kept trying to convince Shin to transfer you to the previous aerospace squadron before, but he always insisted on not interfering with your choices.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Heh, he might have looked young, but he surely was as rigid as those old fossils.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Father said the same thing about someone as well...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Oh, who was it?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "He said that you're the kind of person who doesn't tolerate any nonsense. Once you make up your mind, you'll disregard everything else, and no one can sway your opinion.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ballard finally shifts his gaze from the gravestones and turns to look at Watanabe.'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Did he really say that?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Watanabe nods.'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Hmph, he had quite the knack for seeing people through.', 4: '2'}
{3: "The shared topic dissolves the subtle estrangement between the two, and as a result, Ballard's brows relax ever so slightly."}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "After changing your frame, didn't they correct the color of your eye?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "Can't make the same mistake twice, can they?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I asked them to keep it. I'm used to it, and I kind of like it this way.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "With this eye that doesn't belong to me, I can see the world for them... Though it's not perfect, it's not all bad.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "Don't dwell too much on the past. There's only so much one can hold onto.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Of course, I won't stop moving forward because of it. They're never a burden to begin with, but my motivation to keep going.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "I heard you're also in charge of transporting Gestalt's central core this time?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'm not the only one... You even know about that?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'This mission involves more than just the air force. The Purifying Force will also take action.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Could it be...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Thinking of the recent rumors about the Purifying Force, Watanabe frowns.'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "Don't overthink it. Leave those despicable opportunists to us.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "But I've also heard that sometimes, the Purifying Force's methods tend to be... a bit extreme?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "Desperate times call for desperate measures. There's no need to hold back against those guys anyway.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'That central core will be sent to Eden II, right?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's now called Babylonia.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Ballard... do you think we're doing the right thing?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'What do you mean?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "We both have witnessed Gestalt's riot and know the direct cause of the current situation, yet those in power chose to hide it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Even after they conducted months-long inspections and implemented quarantine measures, they still decided to rely on this flawed thing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I understand that they're probably out of optionsâ€”Babylonia's operations need Gestalt's support.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "But aren't they exposing themselves to the risk of repeating the same mistake?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Silence lingers between them for a long time before Ballard finally speaks.'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "I meant to let you figure it out on your own, but now that you're asking...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'He lets out a soft sigh.'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "Watanabe, you can't save everyone as a soldier. The true arbiters of fate affecting the majority are often the leaders who make decisions.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Unlike soldiers, those who assume such positions are bound to shoulder the lives of their followers.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'So they must use everything they can, unite everyone they can, and defeat everything they must.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "As for whether it's right or wrong... How can we, who are in the midst of it, pass judgment?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Everything can only be left to history and the future. For now, it all comes down to our stance.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'If you wish to save beyond what lies before your eyes, then it is time to begin thinking more.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Feel more and think more about what else you can do and influence.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "But there's one thing for sure, whether as a soldier or a leader...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "When we fight for those who can't speak for themselves, we are strong.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'He wants to say something, but the storm of thoughts swirls within him, hindering him from articulating any coherent words.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I need to go meet the team.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'In the end, he can only find an excuse to leave.'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Alright, get going.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'I still have a few old friends to visit.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Ballard looks up at the tombstones on the nearby hill.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory823.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Quite an unconventional meeting location that you picked.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "It's pretty reasonable for two soldiers to have a small talk when they meet at the cemetery, isn't it?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'When did you learn to pull this kind of trick?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Just get to the point.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Hans is dying.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The blunt statement leaves Cyril dumbfounded.'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'What did you just say?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "He was secretly sent to the hospital last night and hasn't returned to his post yet this morning.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'His lieutenant is in command now, and many have already started speculating about his whereabouts.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Could it be...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ballard shakes his head.'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "Hans isn't someone they can deal with that way.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Given to whether his position as the military commander or his personal prestige.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "If they still want to get rid of him through assassination, it won't be easy to cover it up with just some small fry taking the blame.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "There's only one reason for this situation...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "He's too old and too tired.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "Since the failure of the Great Transfer, he's been under unimaginable pressure.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "During the planning of the Acadia Evacuation, every decision has been tormenting his conscience, but he can't question it or allow guilt to consume him.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Moreover, he also has to deal with those trying to take advantage of the situation in the meantime.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "Trillard's sacrifice brought about a brief period of peace, but the deteriorating situation is causing more people to lean toward their side.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "It's a vicious cycle with no end. Perhaps things can only change in a new environment.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "You must've noticed the change within the World Government as well.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Cyril responds with a nod.'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: "If Hans doesn't make it this time... well, even if he does, the demands for his replacement will only grow louder.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Are you thinking about placing your bet early?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Ballard doesn't answer, seemingly still hesitating."}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "No. He's too emotional.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Too young to command respect.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Then... Nikola?', 4: '1'}
{3: "This time, Ballard doesn't offer a response immediately."}
{3: 'After a long pause, he shakes his head.'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "It's still too early.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Looks like we have to go with our safety precautions ahead of time.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Cyril', 3: 'Are you sure about that?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ballard looks up, his eyes devoid of any lingering hesitation.'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'To prevent soldiers from becoming tools, and to defend the final glory.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'We need to start gathering our forces.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory754.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: 'Are you saying they are gathering their forces?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Within the dimly lit basement, a doctor donning a white coat is reading a crumpled newspaper under the feeble light.'}
{2: '??', 3: 'Honoring our most... Nonsense!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zong', 3: "Aunt Jada, don't go tearing it up. It wasn't easy for me to get these back, you know.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jada', 3: "I'm not your aunt!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: "Eh, I can't call you that?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jada', 3: "Sigh... I can't believe I become grumpier as I get older.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The woman, who looks no longer young, sighs softly.'}
{2: 'Jada', 3: 'If only Philip were still around. He was way ahead of me when it comes to treating Constructs.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jada', 3: 'What a shame...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Jada turns to look at the person lying quietly in the center of the equipment. Despite the physical injuries being treated...'}
{3: 'His consciousness remains in a dormant state.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jada', 3: "I've been saved twice now, if counting what went down in the Pulia Forest Park, but I can't even get the guy to wake up.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zong', 3: "I-it's not your fault, Au... Jada.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: "I heard you used to be just a designer. What you've done so far is already pretty impressive.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jada', 3: "Ha, which researcher from the Post-Pandemic Age isn't a jack-of-all-trades?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jada', 3: "I'm probably the worst of them, no wonder I ended up getting abandoned.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Says Jada in frustration.'}
{3: 'The red-haired soldier finds himself at a loss, not knowing what to say.'}
{3: 'So he decisively seeks help from the other person present.'}
{2: 'Zong', 3: 'Commandant, say something too!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Sitting on the makeshift bed, you put down the newspaper.'}
{2: 'Let me connect with him one more time.', 3: '244'}
{2: 'Jada', 3: 'Can you still handle it?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Jada extends her arm to point to your nose, indicating her concern.'}
{2: "Don't worry about me.", 3: '248'}
{3: 'You wipe away the blood from the previous long Deep M.I.N.D. connection. Your fingers seem thin and delicate.'}
{2: "We're racing against time."}
